title: Top 5 Teams in the Trenches + Cris Collinsworth on Paying QBs
itunes:title: Top 5 Teams in the Trenches + Cris Collinsworth on Paying QBs
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys are joined by NBC's color commentator and PFF's Cris Collinsworth as he gives his take on paying quarterbacks, if they still play at a high level once they're paid and how it impacts teammates (7:18). Next, the duo look at quarterbacks from the last three drafts and pick ones they would build a franchise around (23:39). To wrap up the show, DJ gives his top 5 teams in the trenches and Bucky reacts, while also giving an additional team (32:40).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
